hero.title: FABO Accounting
hero.subtitle: Your Reliable Partner in Finance
hero.prologue: We support companies with precise and efficient accounting and controlling services. Whether you need individual experts or a full team, we help you save time and focus on your core business.

welcome.about: We are pleased to welcome you to our website. Our company stands for quality, innovation, and customer focus. With a dedicated team and modern technologies, we work to turn your visions into reality.
welcome.goal: Whether you're a small startup or an established company, we offer customized solutions that meet your individual needs. Our goal is not only to meet your expectations, but to exceed them.
welcome.discover: Take a look around, get to know our team, and discover how we can achieve great things together.

about.title: About Us
about.description: FABO Accounting is a Hungarian accounting and text advisor firm based in Budapest, working primarily with international and German companies.
about.experiences: Our young yet experienced financial professionals are skilled in international standards (IFRS, US GAAP, HGB) and can support you in a wide range of accounting and reporting tasks.
about.valuableness: With us, you don’t just gain extra capacity – you gain a trustworthy partner who understands your needs and delivers reliable results.

services.title: Our Services
services.intro: We provide tailored outsourcing solutions for all key areas of accounting and finance.

service1.title: AP/AR
service1.description1: AP/AR processes are time-intensive and critical for smooth month- and year-end closings.
service1.description2: Our teams accelerate these tasks, ensuring accuracy and continuity — either by strengthening your existing staff or by providing a dedicated team.

service2.title: Treasury
service2.description1: Treasury management requires precision and confidentiality.
service2.description2: Our experienced professionals support you in daily operations, liquidity planning, and reporting – always with a focus on compliance and transparency.

service3.title: General Accounting
service3.description1: Accruals, Fixed Asset, and General Ledger bookings are essential for accurate financial statements.
service3.description2: We efficiently handle these tasks, ensuring your month-end and year-end closings are timely and error-free.

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.description: Our professionals are proficient in leading ERP and accounting systems, ensuring smooth integration into your processes:
technologies.disclaimer: All product names, logos, and brands are the property of their respective owners. Use of these names does not imply any affiliation or endorsement.

parallax_03.motto: Your success is our business — every detail matters.

summary.title: FABO Accounting at a Glance
summary.description1: We are a specialized outsourcing team with a strong focus on international accounting standards and a clear hands-on mentality.
summary.description2: Our approach: transparent communication, dedicated contacts, and measurable results.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Do you have questions or would you like to learn more about our services? We are here for you!

phone.title: Please enter a valid phone number, e.g. +49 123 4567890

form.successMessage: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you as soon as possible.

dataCollection.title: 2. Data Collection and Use
dataCollection.description: We collect personal data only when necessary, e.g., via contact forms.

legalBasis.title: 3. Legal Basis
legalBasis.description: The processing of your data is based on GDPR (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a–f) and the German TMG.

userRights.title: 4. User Rights
userRights.right1: Right to information about stored data
userRights.right2: Right to correction or deletion of data
userRights.right3: Right to restriction or objection of processing
userRights.right5: Right to complain to supervisory authority
